summary: I decided to do textures for Scarlet Dawn that match the textures I did for Crimson Twilight by  jmenaru . I did this because I like uniformity to a certain degree .
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?]
 [color=#cc4125]            [size=5]Attention : The first 25 downloads are broken the rar file got damaged during upload it is fixed now .[/size][/color]











http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?[/url]                  First and fore most   you need Scarlet Dawn  by jmenaru .   Second use NMM or mod manager to install overwrite when asked  .  If you are going to do it manually  I am going to assume you have done it before.



         I did this for the uniformity of the two armors by jmenaru and the retexture  I did for Crimson Twilight . Also if there are any issues with textures here or with mine on the Crimson Twilight page please address them here . The colors are purple and  the other is woodland colors .

      First thank you to jmenaru for such great armors . 

      Second need to thank alpineyj for his little known mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52542/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52542/?[/url]  the courier/follower is pictured in photos the most .

Credits :
jmenaru  -  Scarlet Dawn Armor
Ivy  -   Yarrow
author: cald123
